definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="61" y="114"><field name="trigger">tooltip_event</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcitems"><value name="a"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"/></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:ElectricNecklace</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"/><value name="IF0"><block type="is_key_pressed"><field name="key">Shift</field></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="new_tooltip_line"><value name="tooltiptext"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">§7Arrow Effects:</field></block></value><next><block type="new_tooltip_line"><value name="tooltiptext"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">§910% §6chance for lightning</field></block></value><next><block type="new_tooltip_line"><value name="tooltiptext"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">§7When in a thunderstorm:</field></block></value><next><block type="new_tooltip_line"><value name="tooltiptext"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">§920% §6chance for lightning</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="new_tooltip_line"><value name="tooltiptext"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">§8Press Shift for details</field></block></value></block></statement></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
